Package nl.inl.blacklab.index

Classes related to indexing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DocIndexer
    Indexes a file.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BLDefaultAnalyzer
    A simple analyzer that isn't limited to Latin.
    BLLatinAnalyzer
    A Latin-specific analyzer.
    DocIndexerAbstract
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files.
    DocIndexerXml
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files.
    DocIndexerXmlHandlers
    Abstract base class for a DocIndexer processing XML files using the hookable SAX parser.
    DocIndexerXmlHandlers.MetadataFetcher
    A metadata fetcher can fetch the metadata for a document from some external source (a file, the network, etc.) and add it to the Lucene document.
    HookableSaxHandler
    SAX parser with the ability to attach "SAX-path hooks" to process specific elements/attributes in the XML.
    HookableSaxHandler.ContentCapturingHandler
    A SAX parser hook handler that captures the element's character content for processing in the endElement() method.
    HookableSaxHandler.ElementHandler
    Represents a handler for when a SAX path condition matches
    HookableSaxHandler.SaxPathExpressionChecker
    Describes a path in an XML document that can be evaluated while doing SAX parsing, and keeps track of the current matching state(s).
    Indexer
    Tool for indexing.
    IndexListener
    Used to report progress while indexing, so we can give feedback to the user.
    IndexListenerDevNull
    Ignores all progress reports from the indexer.
    IndexListenerReportConsole
    Used to report progress while indexing, so we can give feedback to the user.
    IndexListenerReportConsoleVerbose
    Used to report progress while indexing, so we can give feedback to the user.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DocIndexer.MaxDocsReachedException
    Thrown when the maximum number of documents has been reached
    InputFormatException
